title: Fragments, 1836–40
medium:
Medium: warp silk, weft wool
Technique: block-printed
provenance: From the effects of Mrs. Van Cortlandt, 1818-1895.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert P. Brown
description: Three lengths of a vertically serpentining flowering vine pattern in lavender and green. They were originally part of the skirt of a dress.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 1836–40.
1836–40. Medium: warp silk, weft wool
Technique: block-printed. Gift of Mrs. Robert P. Brown. 1960-81-2-g/i.
